TABLE.NAME: local_stickynotes_notes
TABLE.COMMENT: This table stores sticky notes that are displayed on a board.

FIELD.NAME: note
FIELD.COMMENT: The content of the submitted note.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The UNIX timestamp of when the note was posted.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User that created the sticky note.

KEY.NAME: fk_userid
KEY.COMMENT: User that created the sticky note.
